attributes.action: Allow British Citizens to opt-out from inclusion in printed media publications, TV and Radio broadcasts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Citizens should have the right to stop their inclusion in UK printed media publications, TV and Radio broadcasts, if the wellbeing of the individual is in question. I.e: matters of mental or physical health, such as stress or self harm. Matters of criminal intent, such as threats towards the individual or their property.

A central government database should hold details of individuals who have opted out and prior to any publication or broadcast the database must be cross-referenced by media organisations to ensure compliance. Press and broadcaster usage must be mandatory and failure to comply should be enforced by fines, distribution capping and compensation to the individual.
